item.description:
They expect over 1000 people -- so we will have table (ask for mario) inside restaurant to meet -- but band is outside for dancing and fun....
This should be a fun night -- see you all soon!!
Savage Brothers is playing at 8:30/9pm pm, $5 cover charge. see www.savagebrothersband.com


Directions
I-91 N toward HARTFORD/SPRINGFIELD/I-84 W
Take EXIT 42 toward CT-159/WINDSOR LOCKS
Turn LEFT onto LAWNACRE RD.
Turn RIGHT onto S MAIN ST/CT-159. Continue to follow CT-159
tel 8606879806 restaurant
my cell 5083803737
item.how_to_find_us: ask for Mario and the meetup table

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Savage Brothers at Albert's Riverside, windsor
